5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Muttalib that is, Ibn Abu Wada’ah said:“The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: ‘The night prayers are (to be offered) two by two. Say the Tashah-hud after each two Rak`ah, and raise your hands in all humility like one who is poor and needy and say: ‘Allāhummaghfir lī (O Allah, forgive me).’ And whoever does not do that, it is imperfect.’”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي صَلاَةِ اللَّيْلِ وَالنَّهَارِ مَثْنَى مَثْنَى
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning (voluntary) Prayers at night and during the day are two by two
